data.caption: profile pic
data.quote: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.

data.caption: lanterns
data.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

data.caption: fire!
data.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.

data.caption: the fist
data.quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
